question: The ratio of the number of boys to the number of girls in a school is 11:9. What percentage of the total students are boys?
A factory produces three types of products (A, B, and C) in the ratio 7:5:8. If the total production is 8000 units, what percentage of the total production is of product B?
What percentage is shaded?
Out of two numbers, 25% of the greater number is equal to 50% of the smaller. If the sum of the two numbers is 150, what is the greater number?
A class has 35% boys and the rest are girls. If there are 130 girls, how many students are in the class?
If 25% of a number is 50, what is the number?
A turtle is walking along the periphery of a regular polygon. If it starts from point X and moves 48% of the total distance in the clockwise direction, which side will it reach?
If a number m is 12% less than another number n, and n is 15% more than 180, what is the value of m?
Water expands by 4% when it freezes. How much water is required to obtain 104 cm³ of ice?

Ethan receives a weekly allowance from his parents.
He spends $15.20 on books.
Then, he uses 30% of the remaining money on snacks.
If Ethan has $10.64 left, how much pocket money was he originally given?
A vendor had some bananas. He sold 25% of them and still had 225 left. How many bananas did he originally have?
What percentage of numbers from 1 to 50 have 3 or 7 in the unit's digit?
If P = a% of b and Q = b% of a, then which of the following is true?
What percent of the figure is shaded?
Three candidates, Pankaj, Rohit & Sohan, contested an election and received 2200, 4500, and 5300 votes respectively. What percent of the total votes did Pankaj get?
